title: Blueprint - Create Mod Hub
description: Lead developer for Minecraft Create Mod's future central content hub. A modern web platform serving as the central hub for Create Mod content in the Minecraft ecosystem.
longDescription: A modern web platform serving as the central hub for Create Mod content in the Minecraft ecosystem. I built this platform to bring together community-made addons and player-designed schematics in one place, making Create Mod content more discoverable and manageable for the community. (Originally tagline: Lead developer for Minecraft Create Mod's future central content hub)
goals: The primary goal was to create a modern web platform that serves as the central hub for Create Mod content in the Minecraft ecosystem. This includes community-made addons and player-designed schematics, making them more discoverable and manageable for the community. The platform aims to enhance user experience with real-time updates, advanced filtering, and a responsive design optimized for all device sizes.
techStack: React 19 and TypeScript were chosen for their modern features and type safety... Vite was selected for its fast build times... TanStack Query for data fetching... Zustand for state management... Tailwind CSS and Shadcn/UI for styling... Appwrite for backend... Meilisearch for search.

features.title: Addon discovery
features.description: A platform for discovering addons/mods for the Create Mod.

features.title: Schematic Sharing
features.description: A platform for sharing and discovering player-made schematics.

features.title: Multi-platform mod loader support
features.description: Support for different mod loaders like Forge and Fabric.
